author: Legocityfanatic
title: Don't take a bite!
review:
I got this Lego set at my local Lego shop half-off. It was $5.00. The parts are pretty good for the size of what you get, there's even a core inside! If you're building a Lego City like me, this would make a good tourist attraction. For a while, it looks good in the fruit bowl. You can't really play with it so it's better a display. Well, there's not much more to say so, thanks for reading.



P.S. Don't eat it!
